name: Meditating
detail: Meditating clears the mind and resets your rhythm. Find a quiet and comfortable space where you can sit, close your eyes, and regulate your breathing through slow inhales and exhales.

name: Exercising
detail: When exercising, whether it may be weight training or cardio, your body releases endorphins which increases the feeling of wellbeing.  Exercising is strongly recommended to keep your body in shape, killing two birds with one stone.

name: Listening to Music
detail: Listening to music is a great way to get your mind off of current stressors. Music can help your mind relax, reduce muscle tension, and decrease stress hormones.

name: Journaling
detail: Journaling is a great way to document your emotions. By journaling, you can write your honest unfiltered thoughts. You can refer back to the journal to  review or self-reflect at a later date.

name: Proper Sleep Schedule
detail: Stress is a major cause of insomnia or irregular sleeping patterns. If this applies to you, consider having a quiet and relaxing bedtime routine. Listening to some soothing music while you sleep can help; everyone is different, so try experimenting.

name: Trying Something New
detail: Trying a new activity is another good way to prevent yourself from stressing and is great to give yourself a well-deserved break. New activities can eventually turn into hobbies,  they are a stress reliever and a potential to find something new you enjoy

name: Connecting With Others
detail: Interacting with others and sharing your frustrations can be a good way to vent out all the built-up stress.

name: Counseling/Therapy
detail: Consider therapy or counseling. Sometimes you may not know why you are feeling the way you are and getting a professional’s perspective can help identify sources of your stress and provide ways to help solve recurring issues.

name: Balanced Diet
detail: It may sound weird, but keeping a healthy diet can help with stress in the long run. Stress eating may provide a temporary sense of relief, but will easily cause one’s weight to jump. Some people, during times of stress, may even forget to eat so having a balanced diet is extremely important.

name: Reprioritizing Your Schedule
detail: Trying to get a lot done in a short amount of time is going to make you more stressed. Spreading out your workload can be a way to reduce the amount of stress you get and give you more time to relax.

name: Eliminating Your Burdens
detail: Sometimes, the best way to reduce your stress is to cut something out of your life whether its people or things. Humans are very fragile and the time spent on someone or something can’t be given back. Make sure that you are okay with your current situation and if you aren’t, then maybe a change is needed, whether it is time away or clear communication.

name: Clear Communication
detail: If your stress has to do with someone, effective communication is very important to solve the issue(s). It is very common to act out of emotions or freeze in the moment but eventually, the other party needs to be notified that the current situation is affecting you.

name: Creating Art
detail: Drawing and coloring is another great activity to keep your mind off any stressors.

name: Yoga
detail: Yoga combines physical movement, meditation, light exercise, and controlled breathing which all provide excellent stress relief.
